official_title: A concurrent resolution urging prompt implementation of proposed class exemptions for transactions involving use of construction industry pension funds for investments in residential mortgages.

summary.text: Urges the administration to implement as soon as possible the proposal of the Department of Labor for class exemptions for transactions involving certain residential mortgage financing arrangements. Urges the Government to continue to support actions that facilitate investment by pension funds in residential mortgages.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution urging prompt implementation of proposed class exemptions for transactions involving use of construction industry pension funds for investments in residential mortgages.
